text: Hagi nagra rama'a vahe'mo'zama sumisumima nehaza nanekema antahuana, maka kaziga koro'zamo avite'ne nehia nere nehu'za, nagrira koroke hunante'za, kagrama mago'a nanekema hananketa, huama huta vahera zamasamigahune nehaze. Nagrite'ma havi zama fore'ma huno nazeri traka'ma hanige'za kenakura, rone'nimo'zanena zamavu ante'za nenagaze. Ana nehu'za amanage hu'za nehaze. Agra'a traka huno masesigeta, agrama hu'nea avu'ava zantera knazana amigahune hu'za nehaze.
